alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 09 at 1:41AM MST until January 10 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Goshen County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
